    Modifier and Type Constant Field Value
    public static final java.lang.String SQL_SELECT_EMPLOYEE_BIRTHDAY_BOOK_STATISTICS "SELECT \n employee.name,\n employee.date_of_birth,\n COUNT(employee_book.book_id) AS number_of_books\nFROM\n employee\n LEFT JOIN\n employee_book ON employee.id = employee_book.employee_id\nGROUP BY employee.name\nHAVING number_of_books > 1\nORDER BY employee.date_of_birth , number_of_books DESC"
    public static final java.lang.String SQL_SELECT_EMPLOYEE_BOOK_STATISTICS "SELECT \n employee.name,\n employee.date_of_birth,\n COUNT(employee_book.book_id) AS number_of_books\nFROM\n employee\n LEFT JOIN\n employee_book ON employee.id = employee_book.employee_id\nGROUP BY employee.name\nHAVING number_of_books > 0\nORDER BY number_of_books"
